projects.title: My projects
projects.description: My professional experience focuses on web development with React; however, my true passion lies in mobile development. You'll catch that vibe in my personal projects..

project1.name: 5 Tenedores
project1.description: The first application I developed following a Udemy course. This app allows users to search for and review restaurants, including authentication and restaurant creation features.

project2.name: Recycling Mate
project2.description: Recycling Mate emerged as an internal project at SimTLiX for academic purposes. I developed this app for the team to test a Machine Learning model for waste classification. It allows users to take a photo and display the model's results.

project3.name: My Finances
project3.description: I developed an application to manage my personal finances, allowing me to create and track shopping lists and generate reports based on the data collected by the app.

project4.name: Alertify
project4.description: This application serves as my thesis project for my Software Engineering degree. Developed a mobile application to alert neighborhood residents about incidents, track them and generate reports for authorities.

project5.name: My TODOs
project5.description: This is my first Full Stack application. By doing this project I learned how to build a complete CRUD with an authentication and authorization system using the MERN stack.
